General.Name: Lion Energy Ltd
General.Description: Lion Energy Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, production, and investment in oil and gas properties in Indonesia. It holds a 2.5% participating interest in the Seram (Non Bula) block production sharing contract (PSC), which covers an area of 1,353 square kilometers located on the Seram island in eastern Indonesia,; and 60% interest in the East Seram PSC, which covers an area of 4,557 square kilometers situated in Indonesia. The company also focuses on green hydrogen business. Lion Energy Limited was incorporated in 1970 and is based in Subiaco, Australia.

3.Name: Mr. Arron De Jesus Canicais C.A.
3.Title: Company Sec.
